snippet: A new annotated and illustrated edition of James Watson’s book “The Double Helix” adds interesting details about the rivalries in the race to decode the structure of DNA.
abstract: Nicholas Wade reviews updated edition of book The Double Helix by James D Watson.
lead_paragraph: A new annotated and illustrated edition of James Watson’s book “The Double Helix” adds interesting details about the rivalries in the race to decode the structure of DNA.

headline.print_headline: Twists in the Tale of the Great DNA Discovery
headline.seo: ‘The Double Helix’ Review - Twists in the Tale of the Great DNA Discovery
headline.main: Twists in the Tale of the Great DNA Discovery
